description: The 36 defined channels connecting gates in the Human Design bodygraph. Circuit assignments verified from source data.

knowledge.name: Inspiration
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 1 (The Creative) and Gate 8 (Holding Together)

knowledge.name: The Beat
knowledge.keynote: The design of being the keeper of keys
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 2 (The Receptive) and Gate 14 (Possession in Great Measure)
knowledge.theme: The design of being the keeper of keys
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent access to the beat energy
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable access to the beat energy

knowledge.name: Mutation
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 3 (Difficulty at the Beginning) and Gate 60 (Limitation)

knowledge.name: Logic
knowledge.keynote: A design of mental ease mixed with doubt
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 4 (Youthful Folly) and Gate 63 (After Completion)
knowledge.theme: A design of mental ease mixed with doubt

knowledge.name: Rhythm
knowledge.keynote: The design of being in the flow
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 5 (Waiting) and Gate 15 (Modesty)
knowledge.theme: The design of being in the flow

knowledge.name: Mating
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 6 (Conflict) and Gate 59 (Dispersion)

knowledge.name: The Alpha
knowledge.keynote: For 'good' or 'bad' the design of leadership
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 7 (The Army) and Gate 31 (Influence)
knowledge.theme: For 'good' or 'bad' the design of leadership
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent access to the alpha energy
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable access to the alpha energy

knowledge.name: Concentration
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 9 (The Taming Power of the Small) and Gate 52 (Keeping Still)

knowledge.name: Awakening
knowledge.keynote: A design of commitment to higher principles

knowledge.theme: A design of commitment to higher principles

knowledge.name: Exploration
knowledge.keynote: A design of following ones convictions
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 10 (Treading) and Gate 34 (Great Power)
knowledge.theme: A design of following ones convictions

knowledge.name: Perfected form
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 10 (Treading) and Gate 57 (Unknown)
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent access to perfected form energy
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable access to perfected form energy

knowledge.name: Curiosity
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 11 (Peace) and Gate 56 (The Wanderer)

knowledge.name: Openness

knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 12 (Standstill) and Gate 22 (Grace)
knowledge.theme: The design of the social being

knowledge.name: The Prodigal
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 13 (Fellowship) and Gate 33 (Retreat)
knowledge.whenDefined: Consistent access to the prodigal energy
knowledge.whenUndefined: Variable access to the prodigal energy

knowledge.name: Acceptance

knowledge.theme: A design of an organizational being

knowledge.name: Judgment
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 18 (Work on What Has Been Spoilt) and Gate 58 (The Joyous)

knowledge.name: Synthesis
knowledge.description: A channel connecting Gate 19 (Approach) and Gate 49 (Revolution)

knowledge.name: Charisma
knowledge.keynote: A design where thoughts must become deeds

knowledge.theme: A design where thoughts must become deeds
